snippet: Ms. Holland, the vice president for original content at Netflix, says managers should avoid micromanaging their employees. (With video.)
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Cindy Holland, Netflix vice president, who discusses her career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Holland, the vice president for original content at Netflix, says managers should avoid micromanaging their employees. (With video.)

headline.print_headline: Learning to Lead on a Pair of Water Skis
headline.main: Cindy Holland of Netflix: Learning to Lead on a Pair of Water Skis
